amendment.description: Amendment prevents funding to implement the National Labor Relations Board's Ambush Election rule.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 173 printed in House Report 115-297 to prevent funding to implement the National Labor Relations Board's Ambush Election rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A147) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 196 (Roll no. 512).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A147) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 196 (Roll no. 512).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A147) offered by Mr. Walberg.
